AWS toolkit for dotnet refactoring AWS
toolkit for dotnet refactoring is a
visual studio extension that reduces the
time and effort required for developers
to refactor legacy.net applications to
cloud-based alternatives on AWS so it
asses the application source code to
recommend possible modernization
Pathways such as porting to.net
identifies Windows specific IIs and
active directory dependency
configurations and also it performs code
modifications where possible to enable
Linux compatibility
all happens within your Visual Studio
IDE it eliminates the burden of learning
multiple tools or working across
multiple interfaces removes the
guesswork and application refactoring
and expedites the modernization journey
with AWS
AWS toolkit for dotnet refactoring is
available as a visual studio IDE for IDE
extension for visual studio 2019 and
2022. let's understand how AWS toolkit
for dotnet refactoring works so it
assess your application source code and
gives you the assessment result which
will help you to choose your
modernization pathway and once you are

are planning to Port your application
you can click on the port application so
